author: Lon.TV
description:
See more in this series : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qQsf3a7YS-4&list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP - In my latest ATSC 3 / NextGenTV DRM update, we look at a recent broadcaster meeting with the FCC that's rife with contradictions. See more tech analysis: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsJJ0Gy1ENvGjbCp7PslRyz and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:52 - Broadcaster Response to Our DRM Concerns
02:01 - Consumer Technology Association (CTA) Fires Back
02:31 - Public Knowledge's Response
03:21 - Broadcaster's Contradictions on Mandates
04:24 - 2021: Broadcasters promoted the HDHomerun!
05:40 - 2023: "Where's the Problem?"
06:31 - Broadcasters Deny Component Gatekeeping Right After They Did It
07:41 - Lack of Technical Understanding Among Broadcast Execs
12:17 - Conclusion
